sentences.en: A forest fire is sweeping across portions of north Maine this evening.
sentences.cn: 今晚一场森林大火正席卷缅因州北部的部分地区。

sentences.en: Almost half of the electricity generated by Maine comes from renewable sources.
sentences.cn: 缅因州产生的将近一半的电力来自于可再生能源。

sentences.en: Back in Maine, I began thanking Scott if he threw one dirty shirt into the hamper.
sentences.cn: 回到缅因州，要是斯科特把一件脏衣服丢进衣物篮我就开始感谢他。

sentences.en: Chief Justice John Roberts is out of a Maine hospital.
sentences.cn: 首席审判长约翰·罗伯茨已不在缅因州中的医院里.

sentences.en: First they talked about the weather and then they talked about Maine.
sentences.cn: 首先,他们谈论天气,然后他们谈缅因州.

sentences.en: From Boston to Maine, roads, homes and businesses are underwater.
sentences.cn: 在、从波士顿到缅因州, 道路, 家园和商行都泡在水中.

sentences.en: Gum disease also more common in Maine Coons than in other breeds.
sentences.cn: 缅因猫的齿龈炎与牙周炎也来的比其他猫种频繁.

sentences.en: He said the citizen from Georgia had as much right to settle in this territory with his slaves as a citizen of Maine with his horse.
sentences.cn: 他说，缅因州的公民有权带着他们的马进入新的领土，同样，乔治亚州的公民有权带着他们的奴隶进入这一新领土。

sentences.en: I had gone to Maine looking for a place to work.
In Maine, Governor John Baldacci immediately signed the bill into law.
sentences.cn: 在缅因州, 州长JohnBaldacci立刻签署了法案使其成为法律.

sentences.en: Maine and Vermont are both trying to insure all their citizens.
sentences.cn: 缅因州和佛蒙特州都尝试为所有的居民投保.

sentences.en: Maine had a soothing effect upon Babbitt.
sentences.cn: 缅因州对巴比特有一种安神作用.

sentences.en: Maine's most famous yield, potato, constitutes about 12 percent of the nation's crop.
sentences.cn: 缅因州最著名的作物是马铃薯, 产量占全国作物的百分之十二左右.

sentences.en: Maine's most famous yield, potatoes, constitutes about 12 per cent of the na tion's crop.
sentences.cn: 缅因州最著名的作物是马铃薯, 产量占全国百分之十二左右.

sentences.en: Roberts headed back to his vacation home in Maine.
sentences.cn: 目前罗伯茨已回往缅因州的家中休假.

sentences.en: The Maine woodsman sits on a stump whose rings number centuries of growth.
sentences.cn: 缅茵州的伐木人坐在一段有数百年年轮的木桩上.

sentences.en: The marshals hired some 650 assistants who traveled by foot and horseback from Maine to Georgia.
sentences.cn: 这些执行官又雇用了大约六百五十名助手,或步行,或骑马,从缅因州到了乔治亚州.

sentences.en: Three Years War begins along Maine and Massachusetts border.
sentences.cn: 1722年的今天,三年战争在缅因州与马萨诸塞州间的边境上爆发.

trans.tran_cn: 缅因州（美国东北角的州）
